name: Evade it!
description:
Get addicted to beating your highscore and dive into the old shool arcade vibe.

Armed with your PC you don't need a real arcade console anymore now you can download Evade it! and let your enemies suffer by.. well yeah.. evading them for as long as you can hold on.

Meet some enemies


Meet your heroes

  

Hop in one of three levels and control your hero with your keyboard or gamepad but watch out! You are not allowed to fight your enemies, your only weapons are the jump (spacebar, south button gamepad) and your ability to walk (a d, left bumper gamepad)

This game was created in four days for a gamejam from five Htk-students (Luan (Libur), Martin (MartinU77), Ben (Benny_Tr), Julia (Julesse), Tobias (Pholiavion)) and of course some help from our awesome Senseis. We are happy about every feedback we can get.

Now what are you waiting for? Download and play.  It's really that simple. ;D
